price: Mwenyezi Mungu akasema: Basi umekwisha kuwa miongoni mwa walio pewa muhula,
footnotes: Akasema Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu: Basi wewe utaakhirishwa, utapewa muhula, mpaka siku ya wakati tunao ujua Sisi, nao ni kumalizika dunia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
